nodes.title: Almighty - Mac tweaks and utilities to supercharge your Mac experience
nodes.author: Khoa Pham

nodes.excerpt: Using typing biometrics, weâ€™ll analyze how your mood changes throughout the day. Youâ€™ll know when youâ€™re happy, stressed, focused, tired, energized, calm â€” and (soon), youâ€™ll even get tips on how to optimize your time to maximize your productivity.

nodes.title: Detail - Upgrade your camera & turn your Mac into a production studio
nodes.author: Paul Veugen

nodes.excerpt: Keystroke Pro provides highly customizable keycap visualizations that enables your viewers to follow along with ease. Itâ€™s the perfect tool for screen sharers, meeting hosts, tutorial creators and presentersâ€”anyone who teaches or demonstrates software on a Mac
nodes.title: Keystroke Pro 2 - Visualize keystrokes on your Mac

nodes.excerpt: Music Widget is a remote app for Apple Music on macOS. It's a take on the original iTunes Widget introduced with Dashboard in Mac OS X 'Tiger' back in 2005. Music Widget looks extra sharp on retina displays because most of its interface is drawn in code.
nodes.title: Music Widget for Apple Music on macOS - A take on the classic iTunes Widget
nodes.author: Mario Guzman

nodes.excerpt: Mac OS keyboard substitution's for most useful thing's like URLs, emojis, icons and etc.
nodes.title: Shortski - Mac OS keyboard substitution's for most useful thing's
nodes.author: Abhishek Naidu

nodes.excerpt: Mumu finds your emoji faster with synonyms, so you donâ€™t have to remember the emoji name when searching.
nodes.title: Mumu X - The most handy emoji picker on macOS, now with GPT-3
nodes.author: Wilbert Liu

nodes.excerpt: Bring your hybrid team to life, right on your desktop. Connect like everyone's together and include your remote teammates with quick calls, hybrid music rooms, emoji badging, live selfies, and more.
nodes.title: Remotion 2.0 - A virtual office for your hybrid team, right on your desktop
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Bunch is a macOS app that turns plain text files into powerful automations, all available from a menu bar with full love for keyboard access. Launch/quit apps, change system settings, and automate the various contexts you work in.
nodes.title: Bunch - Text-based automation for macOS
nodes.author: Brett Terpstra

nodes.excerpt: A simple, customizable, todo list that resets every 24 hours, allowing you to focus on the daily tasks that matter.
nodes.title: Today - A minimal 24 hour todo list
nodes.author: Daniel Hayes

nodes.excerpt: ScreenFlow 10 has a completely new UI â€” refreshed for macOS Big Sur with a new customizable toolbar, reworked preferences windows, improved timeline track functionality and main menu organization.
nodes.title: ScreenFlow 10 - The only simultaneous screen, mic, and camera recording app
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Voice Channels are just like regular channels â€” create as many as you like, add them to your sidebar, control access, and link to them. Scheduled video calls can be surprisingly formal. Capture the serendipity of an office, even when you're distributed.
nodes.title: Voice Channels by Quill - The serendipity of an office, even when you're distributed
nodes.author: Jordan Borth

nodes.excerpt: You want to download something on your Mac, but it's not in reach? No problem. With Transloader, you can assign downloads to your Macs from your iPhone, iPad, and other Macs - no matter where you are.
nodes.title: Transloader 3 - Start downloads on your Macs, remotely from other devices
nodes.author: Matthias Gansrigler

nodes.excerpt: This is the built-in macOS color picker as a standalone app with lots of additional features. Quickly copy, paste, convert between different color formats, toggle it directly from the menu bar, keyboard shortcuts, launch it at login, and more.
nodes.title: System Color Picker - The macOS color picker supercharged
nodes.author: Sindre Sorhus

nodes.excerpt: Over the past 6 months I've been spending my spare time working on what will likely be my last app for a while. It's called Zones and it's designed to organise all the important parts of your life into separate zones with their tasks, subtasks and ideas.
nodes.title: Zones - An app to organise your life into different tasks
nodes.author: Cristian Moisei

nodes.excerpt: The monitoring app you all deserve! It's soon available in open Beta. And launch will be a few weeks after that. https://usage.pro
nodes.title: Usage for Mac - The most advanced and modern monitoring for your Mac!

nodes.excerpt: Keep up with WWDC21. Quickly search, filter and favorite this year's sessions in Raycast. Use the WWDC app to download and watch all videos during the week or any time after. Built by Raycast in collaboration with wwdc.io.
nodes.title: WWDC21 by Raycast - Search, watch and download all WWDC21 sessions on your Mac

nodes.excerpt: Using spatial memory to launch and switch apps in macOS creates a surprising performance boost. Charmstone is a unique but simple spin on cmd+tab & the dock that easily fits into your workflow. It's especially great if you hide your dock.
nodes.title: Charmstone - The quicker switcher launcher for macOS

nodes.title: Sleeve - Your currently playing track displayed right on your desktop

nodes.excerpt: After Audio Hijack, Loopback was the second audio app I bought from Rogue Amoeba and I've used it almost constantly since. The beautiful thing about Loopback is that it just works - you set it, and then you can forget about it.

nodes.excerpt: Focusplan is a powerful, full-featured, and flexible mind mapping and brainstorming app. It helps you capture your ideas, turning them into a stunning mind map. The iOS version is in development, signup to stay informed: https://www.focusplan.app/newsletter
nodes.title: Focusplan 1.6 - Mind mapping and brainstorming made easy

nodes.excerpt: UpNote is an elegant and powerful note-taking app that works across Android, Mac, Windows and iOS. Designed to make it easy to take notes and stay focused, UpNote combines a beautiful interface with a fluid workflow for a refined note-taking experience.
nodes.title: UpNote for Android - Simple, beautiful note-taking app across platforms

nodes.excerpt: Just scroll through your agenda to see the great things you've done in the past or plan far into the future. Oh, and if you didn't check something off today, Supreme will automatically bump it forward for you. Super simple.

nodes.title: Sourcery Pro - Live AST templates for Xcode, powerful source extension

nodes.title: Purifier - Video conferencing AI assistant for Mac

nodes.title: Allo for Desktop - Work together across roles without juggling many tools
